headline: Microsoft Teams is down – worldwide?
description:
Error: "Operation failed with unexpected error."

Will update as I find out more.

Singapore, Australia, NZ & Japan confirmed so far.

"We've received reports of users being unable to access Microsoft Teams or leverage any features. We're investigating the issue and further updates can be found in your Service Health Dashboard via TM402718."

https://twitter.com/MSFT365Status/status/1549934141738651648

My partner is still in her meeting in Teams and managed to disconnect and rejoin it. Seems a little odd.
headline_zh-Hans: 微软团队瘫痪了 - 全球范围内？
headline_zh-Hant: 微軟團隊癱瘓了 - 全球範圍內？
description_zh-Hans:
Error: "Operation failed with unexpected error."

Will update as I find out more.

Singapore, Australia, NZ & Japan confirmed so far.

"我们已经收到用户无法访问 Microsoft Teams 或利用任何功能的报告。我们正在调查这个问题，进一步的更新可以通过TM402718在你的服务健康仪表板上找到。"

https://twitter.com/MSFT365Status/status/1549934141738651648

我的伙伴仍然在她的Teams会议中，并设法断开连接并重新加入它。似乎有点奇怪。
description_zh-Hant:
Error: "Operation failed with unexpected error."

Will update as I find out more.

Singapore, Australia, NZ & Japan confirmed so far.

"我們已經收到用戶無法訪問 Microsoft Teams 或利用任何功能的報告。我們正在調查這個問題，進一步的更新可以通過TM402718在你的服務健康儀表板上找到。"

https://twitter.com/MSFT365Status/status/1549934141738651648

我的夥伴仍然在她的Teams會議中，並設法斷開連接並重新加入它。似乎有點奇怪。
